parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description: The maximum number of records that can be returned for the query. Valid values: 1 to 200. Default value: 30.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: The token that marks the position from which you want to start the query. If you leave this parameter empty, the query starts from the beginning.

parameters.name: ProductCode
parameters.description:
The service code.

> For more information, see [Alibaba Cloud services that support Quota Center](~~182368~~).
